stream would not be closed if exception was thrown out of the

author: neilg
msg: implemented validation of <annotation> information items.  Also, implemented many constraints on element ordering as well as some miscelaneous validity checks.

author: neilg
msg: fixes for <redefine> and <import>.  Also revisited and changed my "fix" for our <any> exceptions from last week; this appears to work much better.
